Class Travel

    public class Travel
extends java.lang.Object

    This class represents a planned ride.

      • Travel

        public Travel(User user,
              Localization source,
              Localization destination)
        Constructor of the class Travel, called automatically when using method User.planRide(). The default PathStrategy is MinimalWalking.
        Parameters:
        user - a User object
        source - a Localization corresponding to the start point
        destination - a Localization corresponding to the end point

        destination - a Localization corresponding to the end point

    • Method Detail

      • findRide

        public void findRide()
        This method calculates a ride from the Localization source to the Localization destination using a given PathStrategy. More precisely, it computes a start Station and an end Station, the duration and the cost of the ride, taking into account the type of subscription of the user.

        public boolean isOngoing()

      • setStartStation

        public void setStartStation(Station station)
        This method is automatically called only when a user rents a bike with a planned ride started with this.start(). It sets the suggested rent station of the planned ride on the actual rent station of the user and updates the planned ride if necessary.
        Parameters:
        station - the rent station

      • update

        public void update()
        This method is automatically called whenever either the end station or the start station undergo any change in status. A new ride is calculated, with the associated duration and cost. If the user has already picked up their bicycle, then only the start station is not updated.
        This method is also automatically called by the UserGUI to refresh the planned ride.

      • addObserver
